channel.title: Please sum1 help with my server not saveing!
channel.description:
[font=Verdana]when i run my runserver.bat file i get this after i log into porkey bob:
Client type: low memory version LOADED: 0 java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\porkey bob.txt (The system cannot f ind the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at client.appendConnected(client.java:8115) at client.run(client.java:8375) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Game saved for player porkey bob Game saved for player porkey bob Game saved for player porkey bob Game saved for player porkey bob
and the runserver comes up with the Miss. Silbasofe Server Console. and this is what im getting at the same time as the runserver is going.
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.156.181.160:1323 UserId: 94541181 porkey bob is signing onto server. porkey bob: character file not found. porkey bob: error writing file. porkey bob: error writing file. porkey bob: error writing file. porkey bob: error writing file. porkey bob: error writing file. porkey bob: error writing file. ClientHandler: Client porkey bob disconnected.
so as the runserver is saying "game saved for player porkey bob" the Miss Silbasoft Server Console is saying "porkey bob: error writing file."
plz sum1 help me out. either by telling me what i dun wrong or giving me a source that they [u]know[/u] will work. help soon!

i hafe te same probleem please help

item.title: Please sum1 help with my server not saveing!
item.dc:creator: @porkey_bob porkey bob
item.description:
@porkey_bob wrote:

[font=Verdana]when i run my runserver.bat file i get this after i log into porkey bob:

Client type: low memory version
LOADED: 0
java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\porkey bob.txt (The system cannot f
ind the path specified)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(FileOutputStream.java:177)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(FileOutputStream.java:102)
at java.io.FileWriter.(FileWriter.java:61)
at client.appendConnected(client.java:8115)
at client.run(client.java:8375)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Game saved for player porkey bob
Game saved for player porkey bob
Game saved for player porkey bob
Game saved for player porkey bob

and the runserver comes up with the Miss. Silbasofe Server Console. and this is what im getting at the same time as the runserver is going.

Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.156.181.160:1323
UserId: 94541181
porkey bob is signing onto server.
porkey bob: character file not found.
porkey bob: error writing file.
porkey bob: error writing file.
porkey bob: error writing file.
porkey bob: error writing file.
porkey bob: error writing file.
porkey bob: error writing file.
ClientHandler: Client porkey bob disconnected.

so as the runserver is saying “game saved for player porkey bob”
the Miss Silbasoft Server Console is saying “porkey bob: error writing file.”

plz sum1 help me out. either by telling me what i dun wrong or giving me a source that they know will work.
help soon!
